name: Floral Dream
description: Floral Dream is a sweet and floral scent that captures the essence of fresh blooms in full blossom. Its delicate blend of soft petals and subtle sweetness creates a romantic, uplifting aroma that lingers gently throughout the day.

name: Citrus Burst
description: Citrus Burst is a refreshing and citrusy scent that energizes the senses with its vibrant blend of zesty lemon, orange, and grapefruit notes. The crisp and invigorating aroma is perfect for adding a burst of freshness to your day, leaving you feeling revitalized and uplifted.

name: Woody Wonder
description: An earthy and woody scent with deep notes of sandalwood and cedar, evoking the serenity of a dense forest. It offers a grounding, warm aroma that is both natural and comforting, perfect for those who love a rich, outdoorsy fragrance.

name: Ocean Breeze
description: A cool and aquatic scent that captures the refreshing essence of a seaside escape. Its crisp, clean notes of sea salt and fresh ocean air create a revitalizing and breezy fragrance, perfect for those seeking a light, invigorating aroma.

name: Spicy Amber
description: A warm and spicy scent that blends rich amber with exotic spices like cinnamon and clove. This bold and inviting fragrance wraps you in its comforting warmth, making it an ideal choice for cozy evenings and special occasions.

name: Vanilla Bliss
description: A sweet and comforting vanilla scent that exudes warmth and softness. With creamy vanilla undertones, this fragrance is perfect for creating a soothing, indulgent atmosphere, ideal for everyday wear or unwinding after a long day.

name: Fresh Lavender
description: A calming and herbal scent featuring the fresh, relaxing aroma of lavender. Its soothing and natural fragrance brings a sense of peace and balance, perfect for promoting relaxation and tranquility in your everyday life.

name: Musk Essence
description: A deep and sensual musk scent that radiates boldness and sophistication. With its rich, earthy tones, this fragrance creates a mysterious and captivating allure, perfect for those seeking a long-lasting, unforgettable scent.

name: Berry Delight
description: A fruity and sweet berry scent bursting with the juicy freshness of ripe berries. Its playful and vibrant notes make it a fun and uplifting fragrance, ideal for those who enjoy a bright, youthful aroma full of energy.

name: Green Tea
description: A fresh and herbal green tea scent that offers a clean, invigorating aroma. With its crisp, natural notes, this fragrance provides a refreshing, zen-like experience, perfect for those who love light and energizing scents.

name: Coconut Paradise
description: A tropical coconut scent that transports you to a sunny beach getaway. Its creamy, sweet coconut notes create a relaxing, island-inspired aroma, perfect for evoking the feeling of an endless summer vacation.

name: Gourmet Coffee
description: A rich and aromatic coffee scent that fills the air with the comforting, roasted essence of freshly brewed coffee. Perfect for coffee lovers, this fragrance delivers a cozy and energizing experience, ideal for kickstarting your day.
